name: Moo Moo - Liar's Dice
description:
Dive into the exciting world of Moo Moo Dice, the ultimate free-to-play dice game sensation. Challenge your friends, explore different strategies, and play to win. Put your skills to the test in Brag game mode, or take a chance and try your luck in Gold Rush. Moo Moo Dice offers a variety of game modes and regular updates to keep the excitement flowing.

Challenge your skills in a diverse array of multiplayer game modes such as Brag, Moo Moo, Red Black Odd Even, 1V1 and Showdown. Take your chances in exciting single-player options like High Low and Gold Rush!

Whether you're looking for a casual dice game experience or want to get real competitive, Moo Moo Dice is home for players from all over the World. Join a thriving community of dice enthusiasts and engage in exciting matches of Liar's dice.

Moo Moo - Liar's Dice Features:
● Welcome Gold - 100K gold on completing the tutorial
● 7 Game Modes - Brag, Moo Moo, Red Black Odd Even, 1V1, Showdown, and Gold Rush
● Brag - classic Liar's Dice mode where your ability to deceive and detect opponents' deception is put to the test
● Moo Moo - fresh new take on the Blackjack game formula
● Red Black Odd Even - eliminate your opponents by guessing what dice the rolled
● Showdown - be the first to achieve the perfect 5 identical dice in a series of exciting rolls
● 1V1 - face off against your opponent in an intense 1 vs. 1 game of Liar's Dice
● High Low - make a choice between high or low, then roll the dice for a chance to win a jackpot prize
● Gold Rush - navigate a Monopoly-style board and reap big rewards if luck is on your side
● Daily free gold - win gold in your daily free Gold Rush spin
● Season pass - progress through seasons and unlock exclusive seasonal rewards
● Dice cup skin - equip skins to customize your dice cup
● Chat - interact with other players using text and voice chat
● Play anywhere and anytime - Moo Moo Liar's dice is available on Android, iOS and now on Steam!

This dice game is designed for players aged 18 and above. Our game modes do not involve "real money gambling" or the opportunity to win real money or prizes. Moo Moo is a social casino game, where winning is purely for entertainment. Choose your preferred gender upon registration for a personalized game announcer experience.
